name: FFIEC CAT
description: FFIEC Cybersecurity Assessment Tool for Financial Institutions

deliverables.title: Domain 1: Cyber Risk Management
deliverables.description: Assess overall cyber risk management and governance

deliverables.title: Domain 2.A - Network Security
deliverables.description: Test network security controls and segmentation
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%network%' OR title LIKE '%firewall%'

deliverables.title: Domain 2.B - Access Control
deliverables.description: Test access controls, authentication, and authorization
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%access control%' OR title LIKE '%authentication%'

deliverables.title: Domain 2.C - Data Security
deliverables.description: Test data classification, encryption, and protection controls
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%encryption%' OR title LIKE '%data%'

deliverables.title: Domain 2.D - Device Security
deliverables.description: Test endpoint and device security configurations
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%endpoint%' OR title LIKE '%device%'

deliverables.title: Domain 2.E - Secure Coding
deliverables.description: Assess application security and secure development practices
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%SQL%' OR title LIKE '%XSS%' OR title LIKE '%application%'

deliverables.title: Domain 3.A - Threat Intelligence
deliverables.description: Assess threat intelligence capabilities and integration

deliverables.title: Domain 3.B - Monitoring and Analyzing
deliverables.description: Test security monitoring, logging, and analysis capabilities

deliverables.title: Domain 4.A - External Dependency Management
deliverables.description: Test third-party and vendor security controls

deliverables.title: Domain 5.A - Incident Response
deliverables.description: Test incident response planning and procedures
